facts: 21% of the Japanese population is elderly.
Japan is very safe, having only 2 gun related homicides per year on average.
Japanese trains are one of the world's most punctual, with an average delay of only 18 seconds.
Japan has over 5.52 million vending machines.
Japan uses more paper for comics than for toilet paper.
Japan has a crying sumo contest where wrestlers compete to see who can make a baby cry first.
Tokyo is the second most expensive city in the world to live in.
The world's most expensive tuna was sold in Japan for $735,000 USD
There is almost no immigration in Japan, with a population of 98% ethnic Japanese.
